entry.title: mirror archive
entry.content:
for the past year, i’ve been working on the mirror archive, an online site of documentation of the first decades of artists who create work with software and for the internet.

the archive is now live and can be explored and searched.

the project was lead by ucla dma faculty chandler mcwilliams, lauren lee mccarthy, and casey reas.
entry.summary: for the past year, i’ve been working on the mirror archive, an online site of documentation of the first decades of artists who create work with software and for the internet.

entry.title: ucla game lab workshop
entry.content:
i led a workshop on custom game controllers in the ucla game lab. we went through the process of turning broken or old computer keyboards and mice into functioning prototypes for custom controllers, as a way to create fast and inexpensive experiments that move away from standard forms of interaction.

more info here.

junto con julieta caputo inauguramos sol de noche, una exihibición de imagen en movimiento en la ciudad de bariloche, emplazada en las pantallas publicitarias de la ciudad.
